price: A ljude je, kad im je dolazila uputa, odvraćalo od vjerovanja samo to što su govorili: “Zar je Allah kao poslanika čovjeka poslao?”
arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ بَشَرٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā manaʿa al-nāsa an yu'minū idh jāahumu al-hudā illā an qālū abaʿatha al-lahu basharan rasūlan
